segments.text: Okay , next question . If Eric asked you out on a date , what would you say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Duh ! I would say yes ! Eric is the most popular kid in school ! Okay , my turn . What would you do if you won the lottery ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let â€™ s see ... If I won the lottery , I would buy two tickets for a trip around the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you buy me a ticket I will go with you for sure !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My dad will freak out if I even mention a trip like that !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright this is a good one . What would your mom say if you told her you are going to get married ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I told her that , she would faint and have me committed !
segments.speaker: S1
